text:
Waldyr Geraldo Boccardo (28 January 1936 – 18 November 2018) was a Brazilian basketball player. Boccardo was born in São Manuel, Brazil. He was a member of the team that won the title at the 1959 World Championship and the bronze medal at the 1960 Olympics.
Boccardo died in Rio de Janeiro on 18 November 2018 from pneumonia at the age of 82.
